web_snippets: DEEPAK CHOPRA MD, FACP, FRCP, is a Consciousness Explorer and a world-renowned pioneer in integrative medicine and personal transformation.
Deepak Chopra, MD, FACP, FRCP, is a physician and author of over 95 books on Integrative Well-Being and Spiritual Intelligence.
Deepak Chopra, an American physician born in India, is a best-selling writer and popular public speaker whose work centers on mind/body medicine and health, ...
